thread.title: Upper Macungie man, 58, cited after urinating in public, cops say
thread.title_full: Upper Macungie man, 58, cited after urinating in public, cops say - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Upper Macungie man, 58, cited after urinating in public, cops say
text: A 58-year-old Upper Macungie Township man was cited for allegedly urinating in public. Clifton Banks, who lives on Cetronia Road, shortly after 10 a.m. Saturday, allegedly was found by police urinating outside the Parkland View Apartments complex. Police found him outside one of the apartment buildings, according to a news release. Banks was cited for disorderly conduct. Pamela Sroka-Holzmann may be reached at pholzmann@lehighvalleylive.com. Follow her on Twitter @pamholzmann. Find lehighvalleylive.com on Facebook.
